name: Surmount - Demo
description:
Welcome to Surmount, a casual VR climbing game for the Oculus Quest that offers a variety of climbing experiences and challenges. These experiences include the traditional find the goal style courses as well as zones designed for pure exploration. Other features and modes are planned for future updates. This is an early access release and should be considered a work in progress. This is a demo of the full game currently in development.

Current Game Features:

  • 7 Climbing Levels
  • Levels can be played in order or selected individually
  • A Climbing Gym with a surprise!
  • More features and modes coming soon

Discord:

We will be working on new ideas and features to add, if you have feedback on the game or just want to know more please join us in our Discord.

Use SideQuest to install this and more on your Oculus Quest: https://sidequestvr.com/
